page.title: 15HOME LIFE
page.content: A Day in my Life. I wake up in the morning and switch on the television for{TVAM.}When the adverts come on I have my breakfast which is three{Weetabix mashed up with {hot milk.}For school I mainly wear jeans, tee shirt and a plain jumper. School starts at nine o'clock to which I walk every day. We have our dinner at 11.50 and I go home for a meal which is nearly always salad. Half past three is home time and when I get in I switch on the television. I always have a hot tea which is mainly {meat, mashed potatoes and carrots.}I go to bed at nine o'clock but I read for half an hour. Wednesday is a very special day for me because I have tennis coaching at the{Queen Elizabeth {Grammar School}for an hour.
